com.github.privacystreams.core

Interface ISingleItemStream


  • public interface ISingleItemStream
    The interface of single-item stream. An ISingleItemStream is a stream containing only one item, which is an instance of Item. An ISingleItemStream is produced by uqi.getDataItem method.
    See Also:
    It can be transformed to another ISingleItemProvider with transformation functions, such as {@link #setField(String, Function)}, {{@link #project(String...)}}, {{@link #map(Function)}}, etc. Finally, it can be outputted using {{@link #asMap()}}, {{@link #getField(String)}}, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        ISingleItemStream transform(Function<com.github.privacystreams.core.SingleItemStream,com.github.privacystreams.core.SingleItemStream> s2sStreamTransformation)
        Transform current single-item stream to another single-item stream a transformation function.
        Parameters:
        s2sStreamTransformation - the function used to transform the stream
        Returns:
        the transformed item

      • output

        void output(Function<com.github.privacystreams.core.SingleItemStream,java.lang.Void> sStreamAction)
        Output the item in the current stream.
        Parameters:
        sStreamAction - the function used to output the current item

      • map

        ISingleItemStream map(Function<com.github.privacystreams.core.Item,com.github.privacystreams.core.Item> function)
        Convert the item in the stream with a function. Eg. map(Images.blur("image")) will blur the "image" field of the item.
        Parameters:
        function - the function to convert the item
        Returns:
        The item after mapping

      • project

        ISingleItemStream project(java.lang.String... fieldsToInclude)
        Project the item by including some fields. Other fields will not appear in collectors, such as toMap(). eg. project("name", "email") will only keep the "name" and "email" field in the item
        Parameters:
        fieldsToInclude - the fields to include
        Returns:
        The item after projection

      • setField

        <TValue> ISingleItemStream setField(java.lang.String newField,
                                    Function<com.github.privacystreams.core.Item,TValue> functionToComputeField)
        Set a field with a function that takes the item as input.
        Type Parameters:
        TValue - the type of the new field value
        Parameters:
        newField - the new field name
        functionToComputeField - the function to compute the new field value
        Returns:
        the item with the new field set

      • outputItem

        <Tout> void outputItem(Function<com.github.privacystreams.core.Item,Tout> itemOutputFunction,
                       Function<Tout,java.lang.Void> resultHandler)
        Output the item in the stream with a function, and the result is delivered to a callback function. This method will NOT block.
        Type Parameters:
        Tout - the type of result
        Parameters:
        itemOutputFunction - the function used to output the current item
        resultHandler - the function to handle the result

      • outputItem

        <Tout> Tout outputItem(Function<com.github.privacystreams.core.Item,Tout> itemOutputFunction)
                throws com.github.privacystreams.core.exceptions.PrivacyStreamsException
        Output the item in the stream with a function. This method will block until the result returns.
        Type Parameters:
        Tout - the type of result
        Parameters:
        itemOutputFunction - the function used to output the current item
        Returns:
        the result of itemOutputFunction
        Throws:
        com.github.privacystreams.core.exceptions.PrivacyStreamsException - if something goes wrong during getting results.

      • getField

        <TValue> TValue getField(java.lang.String field)
                  throws com.github.privacystreams.core.exceptions.PrivacyStreamsException
        Get the value of a field.
        Type Parameters:
        TValue - the type of the new field value
        Parameters:
        field - the name of the field to get
        Returns:
        the field value
        Throws:
        com.github.privacystreams.core.exceptions.PrivacyStreamsException

      • asMap

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> asMap()
                                                throws com.github.privacystreams.core.exceptions.PrivacyStreamsException
        Output the item by returning the key-value map. The keys in the map can be selected using project(String... fieldsToInclude) method.
        Returns:
        the key-value map of the item
        Throws:
        com.github.privacystreams.core.exceptions.PrivacyStreamsException

      • debug

        void debug()
        Debug print the item.
